page.title: 13SYMINGTON SCHOOL UNIFORM
page.content: The girls at SYMINGTON Primary{School wear green or grey skirts, white blouses, green V_necked jumpers, white socks, black shoes and green with blue and white striped ties.There is a green {school}blazer but it is only worn by primary 1's.There is a {school tracksuit which is a green sweatshirt with the {school} badge_the window of Knowledge design and green tracksuit trousers. The boys wear grey trousers, grey shirt, grey V_necked jumper,grey socks, black shoes and the {school} tie.The girls' netball strip is short pleated green skirts, a T_shirt with the Symington badge and a sweatshirt. The boys' football strip is red shorts,yellow and red T_shirts,yellow and red socks and black football boots.The badminton strip is green skirt with the{school}Tshirt for girls and white shirt & shorts for boys.
